chapter.title: Workflow service command-line client
chapter.para:
The mistral client is the command-line interface (CLI) for the Workflow service API and its extensions.
This chapter documents mistral version 1.2.0.
For help on a specific mistral command, enter:

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral [--version] [-v] [--log-file LOG_FILE] [-q] [-h] [--debug] [--os-mistral-url MISTRAL_URL] [--os-mistral-version MISTRAL_VERSION] [--os-mistral-service-type SERVICE_TYPE] [--os-mistral-endpoint-type ENDPOINT_TYPE] [--os-username USERNAME] [--os-password PASSWORD] [--os-tenant-id TENANT_ID] [--os-tenant-name TENANT_NAME] [--os-auth-token TOKEN] [--os-auth-url AUTH_URL] [--os-cacert CACERT] [--insecure]

listitem.para: Show program's version number and exit.
Increase verbosity of output. Can be repeated.
Specify a file to log output. Disabled by default.
Suppress output except warnings and errors.
Show this help message and exit.
Show tracebacks on errors.
Mistral API host (Env: OS_MISTRAL_URL)
Mistral API version (default = v2) (Env: OS_MISTRAL_VERSION)
Mistral service-type (should be the same name as in keystone-endpoint) (default = workflowv2) (Env: OS_MISTRAL_SERVICE_TYPE)
Mistral endpoint-type (should be the same name as in keystone-endpoint) (default = publicURL) (Env: OS_MISTRAL_ENDPOINT_TYPE)
Authentication username (Env: OS_USERNAME)
Authentication password (Env: OS_PASSWORD)
Authentication tenant identifier (Env: OS_TENANT_ID)
Authentication tenant name (Env: OS_TENANT_NAME)
Authentication token (Env: OS_AUTH_TOKEN)
Authentication URL (Env: OS_AUTH_URL)
Authentication CA Certificate (Env: OS_CACERT)
Disables SSL/TLS certificate verification (Env: MISTRALCLIENT_INSECURE)
Action definition file
show this help message and exit
With this flag action will be marked as "public".
Name of action(s).
show this help message and exit
Id of action execution identifier(s).
show this help message and exit

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral action-execution-get [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] id

listitem.para: Action execution ID.
show this help message and exit
Action execution ID.
show this help message and exit
Action execution ID.
show this help message and exit
Task execution ID.
show this help message and exit

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral action-execution-update [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] [--state {IDLE,RUNNING,SUCCESS,ERROR}] [--output OUTPUT] id

listitem.para: Action execution ID.
show this help message and exit
Action execution state
Action execution output

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral action-get [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] name

listitem.para: Action name
show this help message and exit
Action name
show this help message and exit
show this help message and exit
Action definition file
show this help message and exit
With this flag action will be marked as "public".

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral cron-trigger-create [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] [--params PARAMS] [--pattern <* * * * *>] [--first-time <YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM>] [--count <integer>] name workflow_name [workflow_input]

listitem.para: Cron trigger name
Workflow name
Workflow input
show this help message and exit
Workflow params
Cron trigger pattern
Date and time of the first execution
Number of wanted executions
Name of cron trigger(s).
show this help message and exit

listitem.para: Cron trigger name
show this help message and exit
show this help message and exit

listitem.para: Environment configuration file in JSON or YAML
show this help message and exit
Name of environment(s).
show this help message and exit

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral environment-get [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] name

show this help message and exit
show this help message and exit

listitem.para: Environment configuration file in JSON or YAML
show this help message and exit

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral execution-create [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] [-d DESCRIPTION] workflow_name [workflow_input] [params]

listitem.para: Workflow name
Workflow input
Workflow additional parameters
show this help message and exit
Execution description
Id of execution identifier(s).
show this help message and exit

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral execution-get [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] id

listitem.para: Execution identifier
show this help message and exit
Execution ID
show this help message and exit
Execution ID
show this help message and exit
show this help message and exit
The last execution uuid of the previous page, displays list of executions after "marker".
Maximum number of executions to return in a single result.
Comma-separated list of sort keys to sort results by. Default: created_at. Example: mistral execution-list --sort_keys=id,description
Comma-separated list of sort directions. Default: asc. Example: mistral execution-list --sort_keys=id,description --sort_dirs=asc,desc

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral execution-update [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] (-s {RUNNING,PAUSED,SUCCESS,ERROR} | -d DESCRIPTION) id

listitem.para: Execution identifier
show this help message and exit
Execution state
Execution description

section.title: mistral run-action

screen.computeroutput: usage: mistral run-action [-h] [-f {json,shell,table,value,yaml}] [-c COLUMN] [--max-width <integer>] [--noindent] [--prefix PREFIX] [-s] [-t TARGET] name [input]

section.para: Create new Action execution or just run specific action.

listitem.para: Action name to execute.
Action input.
show this help message and exit
Save the result into DB.
Action will be executed on <target> executor.
show this help message and exit
